analysis.Summary: Vue 3 single-file component that renders a hero section for AI-powered product recommendations. It displays a title, description, an interactive input field (FieldBig) for free-form mood queries, and preset mood buttons. Upon user action it navigates to a recommendation page with the chosen mood query.
analysis.Purpose: Serve as the landing hero on the products page, collecting user input or preset mood selections and routing to the product recommendation flow powered by the AI budtender.

Components.name: FieldBig
Components.role: Custom input component with typing animation, placeholder, and action button. Binds to a reactive `mood` and emits `action` and `update:input`.

Components.name: Shader
Components.role: Optional background shader component (currently commented out) for visual effect.

Functions.name: submitMood
Functions.description: Async helper that takes a mood (either from the preset or the free-form input) and dispatches it to the products store.

parameters.name: presetMood
parameters.description: If provided, uses this value; otherwise uses the current `mood.value`.

analysis.Usage: Imported into a parent page or layout (e.g. ProductsLanding) as `<HeroRecommendation />`. The component registers its own router navigation to the route named 'Product Recommmendation' with a `mood` query parameter.
Notes: Translation payload (`text`) is provided inline to `useI18n`; keys include titles, descriptions, placeholders and preset labels for 'en' and 'ru'.
Route name contains a typo ('Product Recommmendation')â€”must match router configuration exactly.
The `submitMood` function is defined but not used in the template; navigation is done inline via `router.push`.
The Shader and spiral background code are commented out; may be reactivated for additional visual effect.
The component uses scoped styles only for the `.spiral` animation, which is not currently rendered.
